transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ha madam.
Executive: Hanji sir, Mr. Patel baat kar rahe hain sir, abhi baat ho rahi thi na meri, isse baat kar rahi hu, sir phone disconnect ho gaya tha.
Customer: Ha boliye boliye.
Executive: Ji ji, sir main yahi aapse confirm karna chah rahi hu, abhi jo customer care pe aapne call kiya tha na, aapka query tha buylead se related, ki aapko inquiry nahi dikh rahi hai recent mein, right?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To aapne kya seller panel login kiya hai sir apna?
Customer: IndiaMART ka na?
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Ha wo login kiya hai na.
Executive: Ha, login karne ke baad sir, aap ek bar check kariye, aapko waha pe buyleads ka ek option aa raha hoga, buylead pe click kijiye sir.

Executive: Click kiya sir buylead pe aapne?
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: Ha kiya.
Executive: Ha buylead pe click karne ke baad sir aapko sabse pehle kya lead dikh raha hai, recent lead pe click kariye sir aap, kaunsa lead check kar pa rahe hain abhi aap?
Customer: Abhi Dev Shakti cattle feed ka hai 100 kg ka.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur uske baad hai Bhabra Gujarat.
Executive: Sir sabse pehla maze cattle feed ka Bihar se hai 2 ton ka aapko.
Aap all over India hi deal karte ho na sir?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To aap pehle na India ka filter mark kar lijiye upar mein, waha pe India ka filter buylead mein na sir ek aapko matlab aise global type ka logo bana hoga, us pe jab aap jayenge to aap apni location matlab change kar payenge India, usko karne ke baad recent lead pe click kijiye sir.
Customer: Nahi India nahi dekho all India aata hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: All aata hai, India aata hai, Gujarat aata hai, Rajasthan aata hai.
Executive: Aap India kariye na sir.
Customer: Ha India kiya.
Executive: Ji, India karne ke baad recent lead pe aap click karo sir.
Customer: Buylead pe?
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Buylead par na.
Executive: Recent, sir waha pe na chota sa global ke niche aisa bana hoga recent aur relevant, to aap recent pe click kijiye recent pe, jo abhi aayi hai recent lead ya latest kuch aise karke likha hoga latest lead.

Executive: Latest option aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Nahi option nahi aa raha hai, latest related na, related.
Executive: Latest ha.
Customer: Related kaunse par karu?
Executive: Latest pe latest latest.
Customer: Latest to nahi aa raha hai wo option.
Executive: Kya aa raha hai sir option?
Customer: Dekho India aa raha hai, all aata hai aur Kheda aata hai, Gujarat aata hai, Mehsana aata hai, Maharashtra aata hai.
Executive: Aap India pe click kiya sir aapne, India pe.
Customer: Ha India pe click kiya hai.
Executive: Uske baad na waha pe niche mein chota sa tab hoga latest aur recent buylead aise karke, aise koi tab dikh raha hai waha pe?
Customer: Nahi aisa to koi dikh pa raha hai.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir aapne India kiya na, India ke baad aap jo lead aapko sabse pehle dikh rahi hai wo kaunsi dikh rahi hai?
Customer: Wo Navsari dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Sabse pehle aapne India filter karne ke baad jab dekh rahe hain to aapko Navsari okay sir ye relevant lead section mein dekh rahe hain, ye teen ghante before ki hai 2010 ki, to kya ye aapko kaam ki hai sir ye inquiry?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi, ye to purchase karne wala hai.
Executive: Kaise matlab kaise pata, sir aapko to buyer hi chahiye na jo aapka aapse kharide sake.
Customer: Nahi sir, nahi madam main to mere ko kya chahiye business karna hai to mera ka pota ka business hai, usse deal karna hai.
Executive: Samjhi nahi sir main aapse ye maze wala ye aapka kaam nahi hai kya sir?
Customer: Nahi main kharidne wala nahi hu, bechne wala hu.
Executive: To sir ye buyer honge na jab buyer hai tabhi to wo kharidenge na aapse, yellow maze animal feed inko requirement hai 2010 ki sir.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To ye ye kharidne ke liye hi to bol rahe hain to aap to sell karte ho na sir ye.
Customer: Ye kharidne wale hai na?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To makka dikh raha hai na waha pe to.
Executive: Okay ye nahi aap karenge.
Customer: Wo makka dikh raha hai, main main kya bana raha hu bhusa bana raha hu makka ka bhusa.
Executive: Okay okay okay samjhi main, ab niche sir ye jaise cattle cattle feed hai 100 kg wala, ye ye rahega aapka ye aapko Rajkot Gujarat se hai.
Customer: Ha Rajkot Gujarat se hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Rajkot Gujarat se.
Executive: Ji ye rahega sir?
Customer: Ha aisa rahega lekin jo jyada mein aata hai na, ye kya hai 50 kilo mein hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm, sir 50 kilo packaging size hai, 50 kilo 100 kg order hai aur sample only chahiye matlab ye sampling ke liye hai agar unko aapka product pasand aaya to wo aapse aage mein bada order bhi kar sakte hain, to business use mein to sir dekho sampling ke liye agar chota order hai baad mein bada order bhi convert ho sakta hai to wo to aap sir of course aise aapko karna hi padega kyunki aise hi to buyer banta hai sir market mein.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Ye buylead aap consume kar lijiye sir.

Customer: Aur uske baad jo Paruch ka hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Uske baad jo Patna ka hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Uske baad hai Latur Maharashtra ka hai.
Executive: Hmm, isme ye 1 ton ka hai sir 50 kg sample only likha hai, aap isko bhi consume kar sakte hain sir.
Executive: Buyer se aur sir yahi se call laga ke baat kare aur yahi se unko reply call back kare sir, actually kya hai na aap jitna portal ko login karke buylead wagera ko search karoge aur aap agar bulk order ka inquiry ka rehta hai na to bulk ka filter hai upar mein, aap agar check karoge na to ek upar mein filter aata hai buylead mein bulk order ka to wo bulk order ka filter mark karke bhi aap buylead ko check kar sakte ho sir to jo bhi dekho sir aapki service ke according aapko daily jo buylead milti hai aap us usme to sir dekho aapko ek se do hi buylead ko consume karna rehta hai na sir, hai na to wo agar wo ek se do buylead aapko man lijiye sir 10 inquiry hai aur 10 mein se aapko lag raha hai do hi meri quantity ko match kar rahi hai to agar aap do bhi consume karenge to aapka to purpose fulfill ho jayega na sir aapko IndiaMART pe daily ki one bonus lead milti hai aur hafte ki 10 milti hai to on an average aapko do hi buylead consume karni hai wo do buylead aap kabhi matlab agar aap portal ko aise check karoge filter wagera laga ke services ko use karoge na sir to definitely usme aapko buylead bhi dikhengi sir aur wo aapka pattern bhi create hoga waha pe.
Customer: Nahi madam main kya bata raha hu kya lead message management mein jo message manager mein jo aata hai ji wo confirm nahi hota hai na.
Executive: Matlab confirm nahi hota sir kaise?
Customer: Wo bata raha hu main lead manager mein jo aata hai usse direct call kar sakta hu main.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wahi lead nahi aati hai mere mein.
Executive: Sir dekho wo lead jaise jaise aapki visibility banti hai agar main is mahine ki baat karu to saat direct inquiry aayi hai aapko abhi hai na sir.
Customer: Thik hai buylead buylead se baat karne ke baad wo aayi thi hai na.
Executive: Nahi direct inquiry buylead ke alawa aapko saat inquiry aur aayi hai sir.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Aap check to kijiye agar waha pe agar aap ek bar lead manager pe jao sir aap lead manager pe click karo.
Customer: Ha lead manager pe click kiya.
Executive: Ha waha pe sir filter option hota hai na jaise direct inquiries pe agar lagaoge to direct inquiries aapko dikhengi kitni aapko mili hai agar aap buylead pe lagaoge to buylead ke through aapne kitni buylead consume kari hai uska data dikhega sir to agar aap direct inquiries pe filter laga ke check karoge na sir to aapko wo sari inquiry dikhengi jo customer ne aapko directly ki hai sir aur sir abhi just na dekho aapki service live hui hai sir usko hamare paas ek mahina hi hua hai to sir online promotion banne mein pattern create karne mein thoda sa wakt lagta hai aapko daily basis pe services ko login karke buylead wagera ko check karte rehna hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Baki account manager sir abhi Amit available nahi hai aap mere ko is number pe call kar sakte hain agar aapko kuch dikkat aati hai to aap mere ko is number pe call kar sakte hain aapne kya unko call kiya tha kya sir directly?
Customer: Nahi unse uska call aata tha na Amit sir ka, to unse maine baat ki na, wo bata rahe the sir ke aapko koi dikkat aaye to mujhe phone karna.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha, ha sir abhi wo office matlab abhi office ka part nahi hai to aapko kuch bhi dikkat aaye na to is number pe call kar lena aap thik hai aapko koi issue nahi hoga baki sir aapka ye customer care pe ek hamare paas ek feedback raise hua tha to main ye close kar sakti hu aapka.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello sir customer care pe aapka ek feedback raise ho gaya tha hamare paas isko main close kar sakti hu.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Thik hai sir call ka sir ek bar wo aayega feedback ji bataiye sir.
Customer: Madam main kya bata raha hu Gujarat ke siwaye all India kar dena.
Executive: Sir ye aapke buying behavior se hi hoga matlab aap jitna buylead wagera ko use karoge na ye AI based hota hai sir usi hisab se aapka location aur pattern create hota hai sir main aapko aap na different different location ki buylead ko sir use karna start karo jaise abhi aap jyada na Ahmedabad ki kar rahe ho aur Rajkot ki kar rahe ho to thodi si na sir do teen buylead jaise alag alag location se use karoge na aap to aapki automatically location change ho jayegi sir waha se.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai aur kuch bhi issue aaye sir aap mujhe is number pe call kar lena thik hai.
Customer: Okay aur aapka number kya hai?
Executive: Rishu baat kar rahi hu sir.
Customer: Rishu ji okay okay.
Executive: Ji ji to sir call ka feedback aayega usko please satisfied mark kar dijiyega agar aap satisfied hai to thik hai sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay thank you so much sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving direct inquiries.

- Wants to make all India buyleads.



Resolution:

- Explained how to check direct inquiries.

- Explained how AI works for buyleads.

- Advised to use different location buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark feedback as satisfied.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, direct inquiries, location, filters
